description: Fix Vercel deployment to ensure main branch deploys to fix2-gpql-git-main-elevate-48e460c9.vercel.app

problem.current_state: Deployments creating individual preview URLs instead of updating main branch URL

required_actions.action: Cancel any stuck/building deployments in Vercel dashboard
Verify production branch is set to main
required_actions.location: Vercel Dashboard → fix2-gpql → Settings → Git → Production Branch

required_actions.command: git commit --allow-empty -m 'chore: autopilot deployment trigger' && git push origin main

notes: Vercel deployment URLs are auto-generated and cannot be controlled via code
Main branch URL (fix2-gpql-git-main-*) updates automatically when main branch deploys
Individual deployment URLs (fix2-gpql-1wjx3b1uo-*) are preview URLs for specific commits
User must manually configure Vercel dashboard settings for production domain
